programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: This event featured the number one contender fight between Alim Nabiev and the former Glory Welterweight Champion Cedric Doumbe as Superfight Series headliner.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The event featured the long-awaited rematch between former champion Badr Hari and Hesdy Gerges as Glory 51 headliner. This event also featured a 4-Man Welterweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Welterweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Kickboxing’s Summer of GLORY concluded with a massive event from the Johan Cruijff Arena in Amsterdam. In the night’s headliner, heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven took on Brazilian challenger Guto Inocente. Verhoeven had defended his belt seven straight times since capturing the title in 2014. His winning streak inside the GLORY ring stood at 16. Inocente looked to dethrone the world’s top-ranked heavyweight riding the momentum of wins over Benjamin Adegbuyi, D’Angelo Marshall and Hesdy Gerges. Gold was also on the line in the co-main event, as longtime featherweight titleholder Robin van Roosmalen rematched interim champion Petchpanomrung Kiatmookao. The pair met previously at GLORY 41 — also in van Roosmalen’s home country of Holland — with the Dutchman taking home a controversial, majority-decision victory.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY is bringing out the heavy hitters for their final show of 2018, as an eight-man heavyweight tournament has been set for Rotterdam. Headlined by former heavyweight contender tournament winner Benjamin Adegbuyi and Jamal Ben Saddik as the top two seed, the winner will go on to win $100,000 for making it through the eight-man, three-round affair.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A stacked SUPERFIGHT SERIES card is headlined by former welterweight champion Murthel ‘The Predator’ Groenhart (68-23-3, 39 KO’s) and rising threat Alim Nabiyev (50-7, 21 KO’s). The winner will forcefully insert his name into the title shot conversation.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Two world title fights headline GLORY 64 STRASBOURG on Saturday, March 9 as GLORY makes its first visit to the historic French city.
